newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH IPF KB H1 GROSS SWINGS TO PROFIT.
newsitem.headline: CZECH IPF KB H1 GROSS SWINGS TO PROFIT.

text.p: Czech investment fund IPF KB, managed by a unit of Komercni Banka a.s. , posted a pre-tax profit of 107 million crowns compared with a gross first-half accounting loss of 422 million crowns last year.
The results were filed with the Prague Stock Exchange, which released them on Monday.
pre-tax result (czk mln) 107.078 profit vs 422.399 loss
Note. Full name is Investicni Privatizacni Fond Komercni
Banky, managed by Investicni Kapitalova Spolecnost KB a unit of
Komercni Banka a.s.. The first-half 1996 loss was attributed to
an accounting move necessary for re-assessing the nominal value
of shares from the government's coupon-privatisation programme.
